source:
horizon_case_officer_sql = """
SELECT DISTINCT
    k.ID AS caseOfficerId,
    k.Name AS caseOfficerLogin,
    CASE
        WHEN k.Type = 0 THEN k.FirstName + ' ' + k.LastName
        ELSE k.Name + ' (Group)'
    END AS caseOfficerName,
    k.MailAddress AS coEmailAddress
FROM Horizon_CaseReference cases
INNER JOIN DTree dtree ON cases.CaseNodeId = dtree.DataID
INNER JOIN Horizon_TypeOfCase t ON cases.CaseTypeId = t.ID
LEFT JOIN Horizon_vw_BIS_FirstCaseOfficer co ON cases.CaseNodeId = co.CaseId
LEFT JOIN KUAF k ON co.CaseOfficerId = k.ID
WHERE
    dtree.OwnerID != -235834
    AND t.CaseworkType IN ('Appeal', 'CommonLand', 'Costs', 'Environment', 'RightsOfWay')
    AND cases.CaseUniqueId > 2999999
    AND k.ID IS NOT NULL
"""
